SEARCH
Package com.example.sprite.Controllers

Class Authentication_Service

java.lang.Object
com.example.sprite.Controllers.Authentication_Service
public class Authentication_Service extends Object
Authentication_Service manages all authentication-related operations, including signing in, creating users, signing out, and user profile management.

It integrates Firebase Authentication with Firestore for user profile management, and ensures users have synchronized profiles upon login or registration.

    • getCurrentUser

      public com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseUser getCurrentUser()
      Retrieves the currently signed-in Firebase user.
      Returns:
      The current FirebaseUser, or null if none is logged in.

    • isUserLoggedIn

      public boolean isUserLoggedIn()
      Checks whether a user is currently logged in.
      Returns:
      true if a user is authenticated, false otherwise.

    • signInAnonymously

      public void signInAnonymously(Authentication_Service.AuthCallback callback)
      Signs in the user anonymously using Firebase Authentication.
      Parameters:
      callback - The Authentication_Service.AuthCallback to handle success or failure.

    • signInWithEmail

      public void signInWithEmail(String email, String password, Authentication_Service.AuthCallback callback)
      Signs in an existing user using email and password credentials.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email.
      password - The user's password.
      callback - Callback for authentication result.

    • createUserWithEmail

      public void createUserWithEmail(String email, String password, String name, User.UserRole role, Authentication_Service.AuthCallback callback)
      Creates a new user account with email and password, and stores their profile in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      password - The chosen password.
      name - The user's display name.
      role - The user's role (see User.UserRole).
      callback - Callback for result handling.

    • signOut

      public void signOut()
      Signs out the currently authenticated user.

    • getUserProfile

      public void getUserProfile(String userId, Authentication_Service.AuthCallback callback)
      Fetches a user's profile from Firestore or creates one if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      userId - The Firebase user ID.
      callback - Callback triggered with user data or an error.

    • updateUserProfile

      public void updateUserProfile(User user, Authentication_Service.AuthCallback callback)
      Updates a user's Firestore profile.
      Parameters:
      user - The updated User.
      callback - Callback triggered when update completes.
